guild.description:
The official guild for all things Ruqqus.

Rules:

💻 No promotion of other sites that aren't a fork of Ruqqus

🟪 Ruqqus-related only. This is a community dedicated to Ruqqus meta discussion. Content may involve technology and politics but must have ample context in Ruqqus.

📬 No spamming. Spamming comments or posts is not allowed.

😀 Be civil. Be nice. Harassment, trolling, and disruptive behavior is not allowed. Basically, don’t be a jerk.

📜 Follow Ruqqus ToS. This is a given.

For press releases, visit +RuqqusPress.

For updates and patch notes, visit +changelog.

For ideas and feedback, visit +BetaFeedback

For bug reports, visit +RuqqusBugs

body: I'd say 72 hours to a week is probably more appropriate, especially at these early stages where the front pages are a little more stagnant. I find half my rep comes over the course of the second day.

body: One handy feature of private mode besides hiding post/comment history is that the site will ask search engines not to index you in their searches. Don't get me wrong, if someone is *really* out to get you, they'll find a way, but it does deter random brigades/internet mobs from other sites.
body_html: One handy feature of private mode besides hiding post/comment history is that the site will ask search engines not to index you in their searches. Don't get me wrong, if someone is really out to get you, they'll find a way, but it does deter random brigades/internet mobs from other sites.

body: I hadn't planned on setting mine to private since I like transparency, but 5 days after joining all of my posts and comments were downvoted to hell. So for now my profile is private to prevent brigading. Once ruqqus picks up steam I'll set my profile to public again.
body_html: I hadn't planned on setting mine to private since I like transparency, but 5 days after joining all of my posts and comments were downvoted to hell. So for now my profile is private to prevent brigading. Once ruqqus picks up steam I'll set my profile to public again.

body: Part of me does get annoyed when I want to see the history to understand the context of what they are saying. But also I do understand possible dangers in letting people see everyones history, so im not quite sure.
